sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './MakeCV.css' function MakeCV() { const [openAditionalInfo, setOpenAditionalInfo] = useState(false); const [stateForm, setStateForm] = useState(1); const [workExperience, setWorkExperience] = useState(false); const [education, setEducation] = useState(false); const [skill, setSkill] = useState(false); const [language, setLanguage] = useState(false); const [hobby, setHobby] = useState(false); const [project, setProject] = useState(false); const [notes, setNotes] = useState([]); function addNote(newNote) { setNotes(prevNotes => { return [...prevNotes, newNote]; }); } function deleteNote(id) { setNotes(prevNotes => { return prevNotes.filter((noteItem, index) => { return index !== id; }); }); } const [work, setWork] = useState({ job_title: "", city: "", company: "", start: "", end: "", descriere:"" }) function handleChange(event) { const { name, value } = event.target; console.log(name+" "+value); setWork((prevNote) => { return { ...prevNote, [name]: value } }) } function submitWork(event) { addNote(work); setWork({ job_title: "", city: "", company: "", start: "", end: "", descriere:"" }) event.preventDefault(); } return (
  • setStateForm(1)}>Personal
  • setStateForm(2)}>Experiences
  • setStateForm(3)}>Finish

*/}
setOpenAditionalInfo(!openAditionalInfo)}> Additional information

Experiences
